title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb fills in for Colin reacting to Kyrie Irving’s decision to opt into another year with the Brooklyn Nets after seeking a trade and the 2 harsh realities we learned about the NBA. He believes John Wall to the Clippers is a homerun move despite the former All Star hardly playing the last 2 seasons. He talks to NBA reporter Frank Isola about Kyrie’s return to the Nets and the state of the Lakers after they failed to make any major moves thus far in the offseason. 

 

#douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
